name: 莊欣慈
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
Week(s)　　What a World 2 Listening / Reading
1　　        Orientation
2 - 3   　　Listening / Reading (Unit 1)
4 - 5   　　Listening / Reading (Unit 2)
6 - 7   　　Listening / Reading (Unit 3)
8       　　Listening / Reading (review) // presentations
9       　　Midterm Examination
10 - 11     　　Listening / Reading (Unit 4)
12 - 13　　Listening / Reading (Unit 5)
14 - 15　　Listening / Reading (Unit 7)
16 - 17　　Oral Presentations
18      　　Final Examination
scorePolicy:
課堂表現 (如:上課活動、小組討論、筆記寫作、報告表現等) 50%
回家作業 (如:作文寫作、閱讀預習、小組共同作業等) 20%
期中全校英文會考成績 15%
期末全校英文會考成績 15%
materials:
1. What a World 2 Listening: Amazing Stories from Around the Globe. Broukal. (2011) (Pearson Education)
2. What a World 2 Reading: Amazing Stories from Around the Globe. Broukal. (2011) (Pearson Education)
